column5: We have formed more partners and expanded to Waterloo, Kitchener, Aylmer and another school in Guelph, Manitoulin Island has another School, Sarnia has 2 more Schools and Owen Sound has 3 more Schools, here are a couple small videos showing this years Chinook Salmon. #BrucePower #BigAlsPets #BlackflyLures #ChinookSalmon #Salmon  https://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/2018/01/teeswater-hillcrest-school-has-unique.html
